instruction: Write a pitch for a horror movie that plays on the island Sylt in northern germany in the 19th century. Include fishermen and a sinister force that drives the inhabitants insane.
output:
Title: "The Curse of Sylt"

In the 19th century, the small island of Sylt in northern Germany was a peaceful and serene place, known for its beautiful beaches and picturesque fishing villages. However, all of that changed when a mysterious and sinister force began to drive the inhabitants insane.

The story begins with a group of fishermen who set out to sea one day, only to return to find their village empty and their loved ones gone. As they search for answers, they discover that their friends and family have been taken by a dark and malevolent force that has been lurking in the waters around the island.

The fishermen soon realize that they are the only ones who can stop this evil, and they must embark on a perilous journey to uncover the source of the curse and put an end to it. Along the way, they encounter strange and terrifying creatures, and they must fight to maintain their sanity as the curse begins to take hold of them as well.

As the fishermen delve deeper into the mystery, they uncover a dark secret that has been hidden on the island for centuries. A secret that has been waiting to be unleashed, and one that will change the course of their lives forever.

"The Curse of Sylt" is a chilling horror movie that will keep you on the edge of your seat from start to finish. With its haunting atmosphere, terrifying creatures, and a sinister force that drives the inhabitants insane, this movie is sure to leave you sleeping with the lights on.
